TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed ToolTipService extends System.Object
public ref class ToolTipService abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示提供屬性和事件的服務，以控制工具提示的顯示和行為。

span.span: Represents a service that provides properties and events to control the display and behavior of tooltips.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定定義項目的工具提示或屬性。You define a tooltip for an element by setting the or property. ToolTip 屬性接受一個子系。The ToolTip property takes one child. 子系的內容可能與簡單的文字字串更複雜的內容如包含內嵌文字和項目。The content of the child can vary from a simple text string to more complex content such as a that has embedded text and elements. 您可以定義為工具提示內容物件，但這不是必要。You can define tooltip content as a object, but this is not required. 當您沒有定義內容做為工具提示物件，您可以使用來定位及自訂工具提示內容的屬性。When you do not define the tooltip content as a object, you can use the properties to position and customize the tooltip content. 附加屬性的類別可用來判斷放置、 行為和外觀的工具提示。Attached properties of the class are used to determine the placement, behavior, and appearance of a tooltip. 這些屬性會設定此元素會定義工具提示。These properties are set on the element that defines the tooltip. 類別和類別共用許多相同的屬性，可用來自訂工具提示。The class and the class share many of the same properties that are used to customize a tooltip. 如果對等和同時設定屬性，屬性會優先。If equivalent and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 例如，如果兩個屬性和屬性都設為物件、 值屬性使用。For example, if both the property and the property are set for a object, the value of the property is used. 下列計時屬性只會定義類別及所使用的所有工具提示：The following timing properties are only defined for the class and are used by all tooltips: - - - 如需如何處理發生時，工具提示開啟或關閉的事件資訊，請參閱和欄位。For information about how to handle the events that occur when the tooltip opens or closes, see the and fields. ， ， ，和行為中的相同名稱的屬性與類似類別。, , , , and behave similarly to the properties of the same name in the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用類別來指定工具提示的行為。The following example shows how the use the class to specify the behavior of a tooltip. 設定的屬性是附加到公開的工具提示的項目直接的類別。You set the properties of the class by attaching them directly to the element that exposes the tooltip. [!code-xaml[ToolTipService#NoToolTip](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#notooltip)]

summary.span: 識別由使用 服務以顯示工具提示之物件公開 事件。

span.span: Identifies the event that is exposed by objects that use the service to display tooltips.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具提示關閉之前，就會發生事件。The event occurs immediately before a tooltip closes. 此欄位會註冊的行為類別，可使用此服務的事件。This field registers the behavior of the event for classes that use this service. 和這兩個類別會實作和公開此事件到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]存取子和。The and classes both implement the and expose this event through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessors and . 如果您指定做為工具提示物件工具提示關閉時，也會引發事件。If you specify the tooltip as a object, the event is also raised when the tooltip closes. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how to set an event handler for the event. 在此情況下，事件處理常式為實際，因為附加處理常式是在衍生的類別的。In this case, the event handler is actually for , because the where the handler is attached is a derived class of . [!code-csharp[ToolTipService#ToolTipServiceEventHandlers](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#tooltipserviceeventhandlers)] [!code-vb[ToolTipService#ToolTipServiceEventHandlers](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#tooltipserviceeventhandlers)] [!code-csharp[ToolTipService#ToolTipOpenAndCloseHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#tooltipopenandclosehandler)] [!code-vb[ToolTipService#ToolTipOpenAndCloseHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#tooltipopenandclosehandler)]

summary.span: 識別由使用 服務以顯示工具提示之物件公開 事件。

span.span: Identifies the event that is exposed by objects that use the service to display tooltips.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具提示開啟之前，就會發生事件。The event occurs immediately before a tooltip opens. 如果未定義工具提示，或設定工具提示內容不會發生此事件為 null。This event does not occur if the tooltip is not defined or if the tooltip content is set to null. 此欄位會註冊的行為類別，可使用此服務的事件。This field registers the behavior of the event for classes that use this service. 和這兩個類別會實作和公開此事件到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]存取子和。The and classes both implement the and expose this event through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessors and . 如果您指定做為工具提示物件工具提示開啟時，也會引發事件。If you specify the tooltip as a object, the event is also raised when the tooltip opens. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how to set an event handler for the event. 在此情況下，事件處理常式為實際，因為附加處理常式是在衍生的類別的。In this case, the event handler is actually for , because the where the handler is attached is a derived class of . [!code-csharp[ToolTipService#ToolTipServiceEventHandlers](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#tooltipserviceeventhandlers)] [!code-vb[ToolTipService#ToolTipServiceEventHandlers](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#tooltipserviceeventhandlers)] [!code-csharp[ToolTipService#ToolTipOpenAndCloseHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#tooltipopenandclosehandler)] [!code-vb[ToolTipService#ToolTipOpenAndCloseHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#tooltipopenandclosehandler)]
